title: Classic Legends aim at higher sales in premium motorcycles segment
description: Classic Legends Pvt Limited, which relaunched Jawa, Yezdi, and BSA bikes in India, aims to increase its sales in the premium motorcycle segment. With current monthly sales of 4,000 to 5,000 units, the company targets an annual sale of one lakh units within the next 12 months.
